DESCRIPTION: Performs a bitwise mask clear operation.
EXAMPLE: <h3>BitMaskClear Example</h3> <p>Returns number bitwise cleared with length bits beginning from start.</p> <p>BitMaskClear(255, 4, 4): <cfoutput>#BitMaskClear(255, 4, 4)#</cfoutput></p> <p>BitMaskClear(255, 0, 4): <cfoutput>#BitMaskClear(255, 0, 4)#</cfoutput></p> <p>BitMaskClear(128, 0, 7): <cfoutput>#BitMaskClear(128, 0, 7)#</cfoutput></p>
USAGE: Bit functions operate on 32-bit signed integers, in the range -2147483648 â€“ 2147483647.

Parameter.DESCRIPTION: Integer, in the range 0-31, inclusive; start bit for mask
Integer, in the range 0-31, inclusive; length of mask
